titles.title: To amend the Agricultural Act of 2014 to reauthorize the Acer Access and Development Program.
Acer Access and Development Program Reauthorization Act
Acer Access and Development Program Reauthorization Act
Acer Access and Development Program Reauthorization Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Biotechnology, Horticulture, and Research.

bill.summary:
Acer Access and Development Program Reauthorization Act
This bill amends the Agricultural Act of 2014 to reauthorize the Acer Access and Development Program through FY2023. (The Department of Agriculture program provides grants to states, tribal governments, and research institutions to promote the domestic maple syrup industry.)
